tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_circuit_configurations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_name VARCHAR(50),
    circuit_description TEXT,
    qubit_count INT,
    gate_operations JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumCircuits (
    circuit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    circuit_description TEXT,
    qubits_count INT,
    gates_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE ErrorCorrectionCodes (
    code_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    code_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    code_description TEXT,
    code_length INT,
    redundancy_factor INT
);

CREATE TABLE ErrorRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT,
    error_id INT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES QuantumCircuits(circuit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES Errors(error_id)
);

CREATE TABLE qubits (
    qubit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT,
    qubit_name VARCHAR(50),
    qubit_state VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gates (
    gate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT,
    gate_name VARCHAR(50),
    gate_operation VARCHAR(50),
    gate_qubit_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gate_qubit_id) REFERENCES qubits(qubit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE error_correction (
    error_code_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT,
    error_code_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_correction_method VARCHAR(50),
    error_probability FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE qubits (
    qubit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    qubit_name VARCHAR(255),
    qubit_state VARCHAR(10),
    circuit_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gates (
    gate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gate_name VARCHAR(255),
    gate_type VARCHAR(50),
    qubit_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (qubit_id) REFERENCES qubits(qubit_id)
);
